name: Carol D. WEISHORN and Scott Weishorn, her husband, Appellants, v. MILES-CUTTER and/or Miles, Inc., a corporation, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Carol D. WEISHORN and Scott Weishorn, her husband, Appellants, v. MILES-CUTTER and/or Miles, Inc., a corporation, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Based on its opinion, the Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Irving M. Portnoy, Renee E. Solomon, Pittsburgh, for Carol and Scott Weishorn.
Edward S. Schmidt, John D. Goetz, Pittsburgh, for Miles-Cutter.
casebody.head_matter:
746 A.2d 1117
Carol D. WEISHORN and Scott Weishorn, her husband, Appellants, v. MILES-CUTTER and/or Miles, Inc., a corporation, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 7, 2000.
Decided March 23, 2000.
Irving M. Portnoy, Renee E. Solomon, Pittsburgh, for Carol and Scott Weishorn.
Edward S. Schmidt, John D. Goetz, Pittsburgh, for Miles-Cutter.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
